item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
The Social Media Manager role involves developing, creating, and editing short videos for social media platforms using tools such as Capcut and Inshot, writing compelling social media posts and captions, and maintaining a consistent brand voice across all channels. It also includes planning, scheduling, and posting content, engaging with our online community, managing the social media content calendar, building relationships, monitoring user-generated content, and generating performance reports.

Here are the key responsibilities and requirements for the role:

Responsibilities:
• Develop, create, and edit short videos for social media platforms using tools such as Capcut and Inshot.
• Write compelling and engaging social media posts and captions.
• Maintain a consistent brand voice and tone across all social media channels.
• Plan, schedule, and post content across various social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc).
• Engage with our online community by responding to comments, messages, and mentions in a timely and professional manner.
• Manage the social media content calendar to ensure a consistent posting schedule.
• Build and nurture relationships with our online community.
• Monitor and moderate user-generated content to ensure compliance with community guidelines and brand standards.
• Monitor social media performance and generate reports on key metrics.
• Analyze data to inform and adjust social media strategies for improved performance and engagement.
• Stay updated on industry trends and emerging social media platforms and technologies.

Requirements:
• Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
• Proficiency in basic video editing using tools such as Capcut and Inshot.
• Strong writing skills with the ability to craft compelling and engaging content.
• Experience in managing social media platforms and content calendars.
• Excellent communication and community management skills.
• Ability to analyze data and generate actionable insights.
• Creative thinking and the ability to stay ahead of social media trends.
• Familiarity with social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer) is a plus.

If this role interests you and you believe it would be a good fit, we would love to hear from you. Please let us know when you can be available to discuss the role in detail and also send us your social media handles for platforms such as Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, and any other accounts you have been actively working on.

item.title: Graphic Designer + Content Creator + Video Editor | Long term position | Holistic Wellness Center - Upwork
item.description:
Role Description:

We are an incredibly unique and creative holistic wellness center and health-focused restaurant in Dubai, seeking a talented and creative individual to create high performing Social Media Posts / Reels / Video Ads / Image-based Newsletters / Printed materials / etc. with a specific sense of aesthetics.

All branding guidelines such as logos, colours & font styles etc. will be given, and the candidate will demonstrate exceptional attention to detail to match these guidelines and develop the same sense of style with any creative materials.

The ideal candidate will have strong skills in both graphic design & video editing, with a comprehensive understanding of brand guidelines to ensure a cohesive visual expression across all platforms. Additionally, the ability to leverage AI tools for enhanced productivity and creativity is essential.

Responsibilities:

-Design engaging social media visuals, videos, ads, newsletters and print materials following the brand guidelines.
-Edit videos from raw footage captured on mobile devices, to create polished, professional content that effectively advertise and sell Holistic Wellness Services online with a high ROI.
-Use various editing tools, including AI-powered software, to create ad creatives, social media posts, typography, and photo retouching.
-Streamline the visual expression of the brand across different media using AI tools to enhance efficiency and creativity.
-Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and deliver creative solutions.
-Ensure all content aligns with the brand's voice and aesthetic.
-Stay updated with the latest AI trends and integrate them into design and video editing processes.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in graphic design applied to both online and printed content.
- Proven experience in video editing focused on selling services
- Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc.), and familiarity with AI tools and software.
- Strong command of the English language ; bilingual abilities in Arabic are highly preferred.
- Excellent understanding of typography, color theory, and layout design.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Attention to detail and a strong sense of aesthetics.
- Portfolio showcasing previous work in graphic design and video editing, including examples of AI-enhanced projects.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience working with social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.).
- Understanding of current design trends and best practices.
- Ability to adapt to feedback and refine designs accordingly.
- Knowledge of AI applications in design and video editing for increased productivity and innovation.

How to Apply:

If you are a creative individual with a passion for video editing and design, and the ability to harness the power of AI when applicable, we would love to hear from you!
Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.
